title: Mutate Mobs
description:
Some mobs can be mutated into powerfull creatures.

First Oriana will have to create a
Formula Y or Compound Z to you.

After that you will have to throw this potion towards a mutable mob.

The Wither Skeleton, Blaze, Shulker, Husk, Hoglin and Zombie (Snowy or Jungle biomes) can be mutated with this method.
